price: Anageuzwa kutokana na haki mwenye kugeuzwa.
footnotes: Huacha kuamini hiyo ahadi ya kweli na malipo yatakayo kuwa huyo anaye acha, kwa sababu amekhiari kufuata pumbao la nafsi yake kuliko akili yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
